name: Defying Instincts
description:
This game submission is for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

You play as a cat called Knúria and you are hurting a harmless bird that has babies and has been collecting food for them. After realizing what you have done, you decide to help the birdie get to its home, for which you have to cross:

- The most dangerous living room of all times

- The goriest and most horrible kitchen you have ever seen

Going through the kitchen window will allow Knúria to make its way to the garden and reunite Birdie with its offspring.

Controls:

WASD - Arrow keys:

>> Move

Enter

>> Interact / Drop Birdie / Pickup Birdie

Esc

>> Restart Current level if you get stuck

This game has been made entirely during the Game Jam by myself and a friend. I hope you enjoy it!
